commit message: Refactored GpxReader into an event based GpxReaderBase and a collecting part GpxReader
gpx-file autoZoomTo to show all point in gpx file
added support for formats gpx-v1.0 and kml-v2.2
xml parser Implemented support xml-namespaces so it can even pick gpx/kml that is embedded in other xml-formats
added from http://osmbonuspack.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ changeset 612 20150124: OSMBonusPack with gradle-dependencies instead of local lib
added BonusTutorialActivity to find out why LocationMapViewer.java crashes
fixed sample so it does not crash in android 2.1 any more
Reverted chages in bonuspack and BonusTutorialActivity. Replaced RadiusMarkerClusterer with RadiusMarkerClustererWithInfo to avoid crash in android2.1
Merge branch 'test' without test code: Fixed Exception in Android2.1 RadiusMarkerClusterer
Tried to add workaround for useDataConnection does not prevent tile-download in emulator.
Removed locationMapViewer preferences offline because it is not completed/working osmDroid
GeoIntentDemoActivity Fixed initial geo uri; LocationMapViewer: removed polygon demo code
GuestureOverlay DoubleDrag show selection as square
curent lat/lon/zoom can be modified/viewed in the SettingsActivity.java
Finiszhed implementing GuestureOverlay: DTouch: ZoomInWithNewCenter; DDrag: ZoomToFitRectangle
fixed intent-filter. about box with <a href='geo:...'... links demonstrating html-api
